Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Future , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Sylvie Laufeydottir
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Sylvie starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
WELL THEN, DON'T ASK: Stealth. Shape Change, but succeeds on 4-6. When Sylvie uses Shape Change and succeeds, she can't be targeted by opposing effects until your next turn.
YEAH, THAT'S NOT HOW ENCHANTMENT WORKS: Mind Control. When Sylvie uses it, after resolutions she may use Mind Control as FREE, but only to target a character adjacent to a previous target that she hasn't targeted with Mind Control this turn regardless of range, line of fire, or adjacency.
Trade Sylvie Want Sylvie

Comments
June 13, 2022
Oathful
Sylvie is going to infuriate your opponent. She brings solid stats and powers to the table, but her lack of move-and-attack hurts her a bit. However, that is circumvented if you run Mobius with here (which I recommend). If you can get a Mind Control chain going it can feel almost unfair how much you can accomplish with her. She is very reminiscent of Jason Wyngarde from Animated X-Men, but she trades his Bystander shenanigan's for more offensive power. Thematic: 9/10 Viability: 9/10 Fun Factor: 7/10, can't deicide which way she leans
May 27, 2022
Bobcat2022
Leaving aside the Tesseract thing, she got decent results for me in Sealed last night. The special Mind Control is very show-accurate, and gives some real potential for finesse, since where you move your first MC target determines who can be your second. Pulse Wave mostly served as a deterrent, or retaliation for knocking out her taxi (she kinda wants a nice cheap taxi to cart her around, if she doesn’t have the Tesseract). Her Stealth and super-Shape Change being traited, and comboing well with her powers on the back dial, made me unafraid to place her fairly aggressively, which mostly worked out well. Plus it’s always fun when a strike-from-the-shadows manipulator just flips out into a sword-wielding maniac when the manipulation stops working.
May 4, 2022
Goop
50/50 SC with SS and Stealth + Mystics does make her a hard target. I like her for that reason alone. She's going to be a pain to deal with. Especially if she is using tesseract for prob along with her outwit. Getting 2 MCs is great but she is 65pts and there are cheaper figures that can do similar. Still though, her defense makes her a nasty piece.
